title: How to self-publish a book in a week - Quora

response.answer_text: Self publishing in a week seems only possible, only if every aspects of pre-publishing has been met. I.e. proofread, edited, book cover has been designed and ready and more. Being a Co-founder of a self-publishing house myself, even if the above criterias are met, publishing in a week is not possible. The only way it can be achieved is if you are looking ya online publishing. Where you are required to do everything and the online publishing platform works as a medium of selling you book. A self publishing is a viable way. As it is affordable, quick and moreover pays you 100% royalty on the completesales of your book. Unlike a traditional publishing house, where only 25% of royalty is paid in the end. For more information on understanding the differences between the 3 forms of publishing aka Self-publishing| Traditional publishing and Online publishing. You can reach out to me at Self Publishing and I would be happy to help. Have a Great Day!

Assuming you have your manuscript and cover design ready in final form, you can self publish ebook through Amazon kdp & paperback through Notionpress, pothi, etc kind of self publishing sites which offer free publishing. Your book gets available in market within a week. If manuscript is ready, but unformated and cover design also needed, these facilities are available in above mentioned publishers for a price or you can hire a professional from some freelancer sites like fiver, upwork etc. Note that above given names are just vanity publishers and freelance sites, and you can either get best result or the worst result. The result is completely applicable to your actions for your book. ‘Best results guarentee' are present in taglines only incase of self-publishing for every vanity publishers. So it's best to opt self-publishing for free than choosing packages with vanity publishers. All the best for your book
